document_data.name: Warband Quest
document_data.mainbody: '''''Warband quest''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[quest spell]] from the [[charm sphere|charm]] and [[war sphere]]s that affected a group of up to 200 creatures with the ''[[quest]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: The targets of this spell remained within control of the [[magic]] so long as they were under orders releated to the specific quest for which the ''warband quest'' was granted. All affected targets received a boost in their vitality based upon the skill of the caster, had unflinching morale, and enjoyed the benefits of the ''[[Prayer (spell)|prayer]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: This spell did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind to cast.
document_data.History: [[Duerra]] granted the ''warband quest'' spell to [[Olorn Ridaugaur]].
